title: 62: OBITCH live from Irvine Improv!
description:
This week we’re sharing our full live show from August 4th at Irvine Improv! Don’t fret, we’ve got all the makings of a regular episode! Madison takes us through extreme embalming, and then Spencer horrifies us with the story of Anton Moskvin and his Russian dolls. We’ve got an obituary in the form of a death notice, one that rhymes, and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 



New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://www.joincake.com/blog/preserving-tattoos-after-death/

https://meaww.com/who-is-tina-kindred-naked-florida-woman-wrecks-2-restaurants-tazed-hurling-bottles-cops-mojo-grill

https://nypost.com/2021/09/08/naked-woman-drives-golf-cart-through-florida-police-standoff/

https://allthatsinteresting.com/extreme-embalming

https://savemyink.tattoo

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/6750734/extreme-embalming-dead-funeral-pose/

https://connectingdirectors.com/54650-extreme-embalming

https://www.nola.com/entertainment_life/arts/article_79f5bed5-19e5-5a83-90d7-a2b0816cc9da.html

https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/saltlaketribune/name/philip-thorpe-obituary?id=1646749

https://obit.carnesfuneralhome.com/leslie-ray-charping

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8323382/mediaviewer/rm3001961472

https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/house-horrors-footage-home-grave-4500071

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2iAKoeBebw

https://allthatsinteresting.com/anatoly-moskvin

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anatoly_Moskvin


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
